resources.string: Access to the location service is required for the \'my location\' feature, which shows your current location on the map.

This application requires location permission to enable the \'my location\' feature. Please try again and grant access to use the location.\nIf the permission has been permanently denied, it can be enabled from the System Settings > Apps > \'Google Maps API Demos\'.
Location permission is required for the \'my location\' feature.
Choose the office on the map you want to make an appointment in
Can\'t make an appointment. Try again, please.
Notify me when the appointment is soon
